headline: Air travel 2026 outlook: Analyst predictions
summary: Air travel is projected to reach $41 billion in revenue this year, according to the International Air Transport Association. alk Bloomberg Intelligence senior aerospace defense and airlines industry analyst, George Ferguson, joins Yahoo Finance Markets and Data Editor Jared Blikre on Market Catalysts to discuss what he anticipates for the industry in 2026. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
